abstract: Fans anticipate how new late-night talk program The Nightly Show With Larry Wilmore, hosted by a former correspondent from The Daily Show, will differ from its predecessor The Colbert Report on Comedy Central; Wilmore is rare black star in late-night field dominated by white hosts.
lead_paragraph: “The Nightly Show” on Comedy Central has its premiere on Monday night, and its host, Larry Wilmore, is working hard to prepare while keeping his options open.
snippet: “The Nightly Show” on Comedy Central has its premiere on Monday night, and its host, Larry Wilmore, is working hard to prepare while keeping his options open.

keywords.value: The Nightly Show With Larry Wilmore (TV Program)

headline.main: Something New to Follow Your Moment of Zen
headline.seo: Larry Wilmore Prepares for His ‘Nightly Show’
